title: Video: Tubelord – My First Castle
body:
In following up last year’s **_Tezcatlipoca_** EP, Kingstonian quartet **Tubelord** are slated to release sophomore full length _**Romance**_ via [Pink Mist](http://hellopinkmist.tumblr.com/ "It's their website, obviously.") on 10/10/11, and the Kingstonian quartet have teamed up with one **[Sean Roy Parker](http://www.seanroyparker.com/ "And this is his website. I'm getting really bored of spelling these out for you.")** (also instrumental in running the fantastic New Cross-based Clinic collective) to produce a video for the album track _My First Castle_. The song introduces some surprising influences to the mix (**Talking Heads**, anyone?) that may leave fans of debut full length **_Our First American Friends_**‘ heavily guitar-driven sound scratching their heads, but that’s **Tubelord** I guess, and frankly, the results speak for themselves. **Tubelord**‘s website can be found [here](http://asktubelord.com/ "I'm not even going to dignify that with a response. ").

[Tubelord ≈ My First Castle](http://vimeo.com/29038278) from [Sean Roy Parker](http://vimeo.com/ahohwhy) on [Vimeo](http://vimeo.com).
